metadata.description: Before he was Apocalypse...he was En Sabah Nur. The origins of one of the X-Men's greatest foes are at last revealed - from his upbringing thousands of years ago! Can Pharaoh Rama-Tut get to the future Apocalypse and his adopted father Baal before Apocalypse's evil destiny can manifest itself?
metadata.name: Rise of Apocalypse
